allOf.description: This resource defines a decision support rule of the form [on Event] if Condition then Action. It is intended to be a shareable, computable definition of a actions that should be taken whenever some condition is met in response to a particular event or events.

moduleMetadata.description: The metadata for the decision support rule, including publishing, life-cycle, version, documentation, and supporting evidence.

library.description: A reference to a Library containing the formal logic used by the rule.

trigger.description: The trigger element defines when the rule should be invoked. This information is used by consumers of the rule to determine how to integrate the rule into a specific workflow.

condition.description: The condition element describes he "if" portion of the rule that determines whether or not the rule "fires". The condition must be the name of an expression in a referenced library.

action.description: The action element defines the "when" portion of the rule that determines what actions should be performed if the condition evaluates to true.
